website_summaries.verdict: A lightweight neutral shoe built for fast efforts on the road.
pros: The Zante is lightweight and features an affordable price tag
The upper is stretchy to help with fit and reviewers with bunions found the accommodating upper super comfortable
cons: Not a good choice for long-distance training or heavier runners who may need more protection underfoot

customer_reviews.title: Extremely light and comfortable. Order half a size larger
customer_reviews.text: I had a pair of New Balance Fresh Foam shoes I bought several years ago which I loved and wore until there were holes in the bottom. I couldn't find that model number in my size anywhere online and I went through several pairs of Fresh Foam shoes until I found these which I believe are a newer version of my favs. They're just like my old pair with a fairly roomy toe box, squishier insole, and mesh upper which allows my feet to breathe. These shoes are very lightweight and the neutral ride is most comfortable for my feet. I did order half a size up based on other reviews and I'm glad I did.
customer_reviews.author: Sarah Hamilton

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable, great looking shoes
customer_reviews.text: Am happy with my new shoes. They are comfy and looks good too. I got a size 9.5B (Medium), which is the same size I wear in my Brooks Ghost and my Nike Fly knit Lunar shoes. I wear a size 9 in Adidas boost, for reference. In the 9.5 size I have some room length wise (don't like it when my toes can touch the edges) and the toe box is plenty roomy, which I like as well.. Shoes are made in Vietnam.
customer_reviews.author: H. Nachman

customer_reviews.title: Returned. Toe Box Veers Inward
customer_reviews.text: The toe box of this shoe angles so inward that my pinky toe was bulging through the mesh despot ordering a wide. Such a strange design- made me feel pigeon toed. I have very straight/neutral feet. I ordered the New Balance Arishi instead and the toe box is pointed much more neutral!
customer_reviews.author: jmb

customer_reviews.title: New Balance Zante V4 are like gloves for my feet
customer_reviews.text: I bought Zante V4 because I have had great experiences running with New balance’s neutral sole running shoes. My other two pairs were size 7 and fitted great. I highly recommend go half size bigger than your regular size. I had to return the size 7 as it was tight and go for 7.5. Aside from it, these shoes are like gloves for my feet!
customer_reviews.author: @ladulgarcia

customer_reviews.title: beautiful and comfy!!
customer_reviews.text: Love these!! I was running in new balance zante V2’s for a little over a year and decided I needed to upgrade. Very comfortable, flexible, and light weight - great for people who don’t love the bulky feel some running shoes have. The blue/purple color is beautiful and looks just like the picture! I’m also really loving the design on the bottom. All-around good purchase!
customer_reviews.author: Caitlin McGougan

customer_reviews.title: Fit wide foot
customer_reviews.text: Without the front wrap around piece will fit better for the wide feet.
customer_reviews.author: Lily N. Woo

customer_reviews.title: Buy me! But add a .5 size
customer_reviews.text: I love these shoes so much I want to marry them! Order a half size up as they run small. Had another pair and they were a little tight and never gave in. I’ve had NB’s for years, but something about this line makes them snug. Now I just need to order more colors!
customer_reviews.author: Steph

customer_reviews.title: Beat that wall!
customer_reviews.text: Bought these for my ninja, he's in between youth size (that I could find) and men's sizes available. These fit well and gets him up the 14.5 foot wall on a much more regular basis. Nice shoe!
customer_reviews.author: Michele M

customer_reviews.title: Good running shoe, small defect in one shoe
customer_reviews.text: Really comfortable for running. Love the pressure mapping under the toe. Cheaper here than at the running store. The right shoe came with a piece of fabric inside that looks and feels like it should've been trimmed off in manufacturing but wasn't - a little uncomfortable.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good product
customer_reviews.text: Runs a little small on size. Should have gotten a half size up.
customer_reviews.author: Angelica Fraire

customer_reviews.title: Marathon
customer_reviews.text: Apparently they work and fit great, my wife runs marathons in them and has about 8 pair.
customer_reviews.author: James Smith

customer_reviews.title: Overall good!
customer_reviews.text: I watch American Ninja Warriors every year. I watched to see the favorite shoe they wear. So I got me some. Love em. The grip is unbelievable.
customer_reviews.author: Jimmie McIntyre

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: New Balance is a good quality shoe with excellent forefoot cushioning.
customer_reviews.author: Mary K. Woodruff

customer_reviews.title: I love this shoe
customer_reviews.text: I love this shoe. The bright blue color is beautiful and the mesh allows some give. Love it so much, I ordered it in another color.
customer_reviews.author: Myriam Hunt

customer_reviews.title: Great shoe except......
customer_reviews.text: I have another pair of these. But for some reason the left shoe seems to fit tighter than the right. I’ve been wearing them for 3 weeks now and it still feels tight.....
customer_reviews.author: ALR

customer_reviews.title: Great shoes for running for me
customer_reviews.text: These are the best running shoes for my feet, I think I’m on my 8th pair
customer_reviews.author: patisserieprincess

customer_reviews.title: Fake product
customer_reviews.text: This item was a fake, I have the identical pair already and these were clearly a knockoff. Returned to seller before I even wore them. Very disappointing and a waste of time.
customer_reviews.author: Meghan Brown

customer_reviews.title: Narrow fit
customer_reviews.text: I love new balance but these ones for to narrow.
customer_reviews.author: Christine Guerra

customer_reviews.title: Lightweight and very comfortable
customer_reviews.text: This is my 3rd round of buying this particular running shoe. I like that the design and feel don’t change much with updated versions. And, I love that they keep the color black w grey/silver N as an option. Thank you
customer_reviews.author: tjcosgrove

customer_reviews.title: Footbed is comfortable
customer_reviews.text: I like them . I have 2 other pairs in different colors
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Not very comfortable
customer_reviews.text: They're not as comfortable as I was hoping. I've had New Balance running shoes in the past but these didn't provide the support or comfort that I've had in the past from NB shoes. I wasn't impressed so I returned them as it's not worth the price so for a little bit more I got a nice pair of Brooks.
customer_reviews.author: ncujen

customer_reviews.title: Great shoe at a decent price
customer_reviews.text: This shoe is light, comfortable, and wears well. I normally wear either and 8 or 8.5 and I wear an 8.5 in this shoe. I have had this pair for over 6 months, I walk or run 25 miles per week, and am just now replacing the shoe because the cushioning is starting to break down. I would say these shoes have remained supportive as long as any Sauconys or Adidas have.
customer_reviews.author: k9poindexter

product_meta.title: New Balance Women's Fresh Foam Zante V4 Running Shoe
product_meta.description: The sleekest ride of Fresh Foam continues to deliver smooth for the speedy. Engineered and designed for those seeking a swifter pace, a fresh foam midsole delivers soft cushioning with every step. A bootie construction and HypoSkin upper create a snug midfoot fit while an engineered mesh vamp lets the toes play for efficiency.
